long_description: Treat your feet right with the REI Cabin Scuff slippers. Cozy sheepskin leather and wool keep your feet comfortable when the cold weather keeps you inside. Luxurious and warm, double-face sheepskin leather uppers provide the ultimate in barefoot comfort for leisurely padding around. Sheepskin wool linings offer a warm interior to keep your feet cozy on cold mornings. Contoured memory foam footbeds are topped with cozy sheepskin wool for lightweight yet plush cushioning underfoot. EVA midsoles offer pillowy soft cushioning. Our REI Cabin Scuff slippers feature EVA soles, which reduce cold transfer from the ground and provide nonslip traction for indoor use.
short_description: Treat your feet right with the REI Cabin Scuff slippers. Cozy sheepskin leather and wool keep your feet comfortable when the cold weather keeps you inside.
